name: Beach Wars
description:
Beach Wars Is A Chaotic and fun game where the main aim of player is to save the duck from enemies , the game was originally made for game jam "I can't draw but want to make a game" in unity 5.6.7f1 engine.

I am the developer of  the game and 15 years old 

Coding , animations , music , art everything is done by me and nothing is taken from internet

ART-: medibang paint , pixellab were used to design the art

Game Engine-: Unity 5.6.7f1 was used to make the game

Audio-: Bosca Celio was used to make sfx as well as sound effects

Language - c# (editor is MonoDevelop)
